name: Love Hotel
description:
An interactive first person walking simulator about the stories you can find by exploring an empty room at a Love Hotel. The objects will speak tales of heartbreak, loneliness, and everything in between, if pieced together correctly. You are no more than a stranger in a strange room so take your time, look closely, and enjoy your stay.

How to play:

WASD to explore. Your cursor is the shiny ball. Hover over objects to find more information. R to return to menu. Q to quit.
